name: Climate landscape Wolfenbüttel - Resilient landscape with agroforestry
description: The Climate landscape Wolfenbüttel project is creating a climate-resilient, sustainable agricultural landscape through innovative agroforestry systems. Together with farmers, local authorities and citizens, we are developing networked woodland structures that promote biodiversity, store water and protect the soil. The result is a model for sustainable land use that serves as a blueprint for other regions. With targeted planning, participatory design and scientific support, we focus on practical solutions that combine ecological benefits with economic opportunities.
